scripts.dev: bash -lc 'unset npm_config_prefix; export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"; [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"; nvm use 22 >/dev/null; cd /home/bharath-kanth/Projects/BOOK_PUBLISH_MYANA/Client && npm run dev -- --host'
scripts.build: bash -lc 'unset npm_config_prefix; export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"; [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"; nvm use 22 >/dev/null; cd /home/bharath-kanth/Projects/BOOK_PUBLISH_MYANA/Client && npm run build'
scripts.preview: bash -lc 'unset npm_config_prefix; export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"; [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"; nvm use 22 >/dev/null; cd /home/bharath-kanth/Projects/BOOK_PUBLISH_MYANA/Client && npm run preview -- --host'
